noun.description: A member of the largest ethnic group of Burma (Myanmar) in Southeast Asia.
A native or inhabitant of Burma.
The Tibeto-Burman language of the Burmese, written in an alphabet derived from that of Pali, and the official language of Burma.
A cat of a short-haired breed originating in Asia.

adjective.description: Relating to Burma, its people, or their language.
